intro: Matayba jauaensis, commonly known as the Jauaensis Matayba, is a species of flowering plant native to the Amazon rainforest. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes cotton and hibiscus. The plant is characterized by its large, showy flowers that typically bloom in shades of yellow and red. It thrives in humid, tropical environments and is often found in swampy or wetland areas. The leaves are usually broad and heart-shaped, contributing to its distinctive appearance.
